* LinuxDays - is an annual Czech open-source conference that takes place in Prague. It will be held in 2012 for the first time to replace the LinuxExpo conference, which had a long tradition, but unfortunately was cancelled this year - <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxdays.cz/english/|English pages]]</nowiki>
